story:
Once upon a time, in the beautiful island of Sri Lanka, there lived a curious and adventurous little boy named Kavi. Kavi was a kind-hearted boy who loved exploring the lush jungles and sandy beaches of his homeland.

One evening, as the sun began to set over the distant mountains, Kavi's mother tucked him into bed and said, "Goodnight, my dear son. I have a special story for you tonight."

She began to tell him the tale of a magical elephant named Raja, who roamed the forests of Sri Lanka under the light of the full moon. Raja was a gentle giant with shimmering white tusks and wise, soulful eyes.

Every night, Raja would embark on a journey through the jungle, accompanied by a chorus of crickets and the whispering winds. Together, they would explore hidden caves, sparkling waterfalls, and secret meadows filled with colorful flowers.

One night, as Raja and Kavi journeyed deeper into the jungle, they stumbled upon a lost baby monkey named Mala. Mala had strayed too far from her family and was scared and alone. With a kind heart, Raja and Kavi helped Mala find her way back to her loved ones.

As the night grew darker and the stars twinkled above, Raja, Kavi, and Mala sat under a giant banyan tree, sharing stories and laughter. They realized that true friendship knows no boundaries and that together, they could overcome any challenge.

With a gentle lullaby, Kavi's mother whispered, "Sweet dreams, my little one. Remember, no matter where your adventures may take you, you are never alone. Just like Raja, you have a kind heart that can bring light to the darkest of nights."

And as Kavi drifted off to sleep, he could almost hear the rustling of leaves and the distant trumpet of Raja the magical elephant, guiding him through his dreams with love and courage.

The end. Goodnight, dear Kavi. May your dreams be filled with wonder and magic.
